name: Celestial Road
description:
Celestial Road is a surreal and relaxing game where you collect gems and dodge obstacles while surrounded by beautiful stars, rain, thunder and galaxies.

Use two hands to control (left and right presses), or use one hand to hold (harder).

In this alternate dimension, your only worry is collecting gems and spending them at the shop to unlock more bodiless entities. These bodiless entities are made from stardust, the same things we are originally made from. This universe exists in an alternate dimension. There are no living creatures here but stars, rain, gems and the beautiful galaxies.

Attribution: Music is Ambient Electronic 001 by Frankum and shooting star icon by Justin Church on TheNounProject.
